title: Ancient.Space-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS: 

Ancient Space 

Release Date: 9/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Strategy 

Ancient Space is a story driven single player real time strategy game
where you take command of a fleet embarking on a scientific mission to
chart undiscovered reaches of space called `The Black Zone'. Overcome
overwhelming odds and fight for your life and the survival of your
ship and its crew 

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play 

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online
